instruction: Generate five new ways of presenting a given article.
input: Article title: The Benefits of Yoga
output:
1. Online Presentation: A presentation with visuals, audio, and text that provides an overview of the top benefits of yoga.
2. Video Series: A series of instructional videos that demonstrate and explain the benefits of yoga. 
3. Infographics: An engaging infographic that outlines the benefits of yoga. 
4. Podcast: A podcast that interviews practitioners of yoga and discusses how yoga has improved their life.
5. Visual Story: An interactive visual story that demonstrates the different benefits of yoga through illustrations and graphics.
